price: 43. Sidee bay kaaga dhigan garsoor, iyagoo heysta Towraadda oo uu ku yaal xukunkii Alle (oo cad oo ah in dhagax lagu dilo cidday ku caddaato zino iyagoo guur horey u soo maray)?. Markaasna ay jeestaan intaasi ka ddib. Kuwani ma aha mu’miniin.
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ يُحَكِّمُونَكَ وَعِندَهُمُ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ فِيهَا حُكۡمُ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa yuḥakkimūnaka waʿindahumu al-tawrātu fīhā ḥuk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min baʿdi dhālika wamā ulāika bil-mu'minīna
